summary: Adds more equipment similar to the Dwarven Black Crossbow of Fate.
descriptionHtml:
I thought Kagrumez felt a bit unfinished so I added a bit more gear to the last room. Of course ideally a 5th stage should be added to the gauntlet, as well as a new room. Right now I don't know how to script that. So you'll find it in a chest in the last room of [b]Kagrumez[/b], in [b]Solstheim[/b].

Keep in mind this is the same tier as the Dwarven Black Bow of Fate. So pretty much end game gear by vanilla standards.

Stuff added:
Dwarven Black Crossbow of Fate
Dwarven Black Cuirass of Fate*
Dwarven Black Robes of Fate
Dwarven Black Hood of Fate

*If you need a helmet to go with the cuirass, use the [b]Visage of Mzund[/b]. If you don't have it, you can get it from [b]Fahlbtharz[/b], in [b]Solstheim[/b]. Or if you don't want to do that, open the console, type [i]help visage[/i], find a code that looks like xx038ADD, and type player.additem xx038ADD 1. Of course, replace the xx with whatever you get.

Enchantments:
Crossbow: Same as the Dwarven Black Bow of Fate (50% chance to absorb Health, Magicka or Stamina)
Cuirass: Increased health regen (5x) and Shock cloak
Robes: Increased health regen (2.5x) and mana regen (2.5x) and Shock Cloak
Hood: Reduced shout cooldowns.
author: An3Micu
